question.text: You are approaching this roundabout and see the cyclist signal right. Why is the cyclist keeping to the left?

explanation.text: Cycling in today’s heavy traffic can be hazardous. Some cyclists may not feel happy about crossing the path of traffic to take up a position in an outside lane. Be aware of this and understand that, although in the left-hand lane, the cyclist might be turning right.

answer.text: It is a quicker route for the cyclist
The cyclist is going to turn left instead
The cyclist thinks The Highway Code does not apply to bicycles
The cyclist is slower and more vulnerable
